title: Free Captain Gangplank Skin?
body: So Riot said that you could get a free Captain Gangplank skin if you own Gangplank and if you at least play him in 1 matchmade game before the event ends. I've played a game of team builder with Ganplank and a game of  Black Market Brawlers with Gangplank, but I still didn't get the Captain Gangplank skin (I have the champion). When am I going to get the skin? {{item:3070}} {{champion:41}} {{item:3070}}
